name: ABC
text: To honor the life and legacy of civil rights icon Rep. John Lewis, Rep. Karen Bass told @ABC News that the Voting Rights Advancement Act should be passed. https://t.co/auIS6ltyqy

name: ABC
text: MEANT TO BE: A woman waiting to pick up her newly adopted dog from a shelter in Tennessee was surprised when workers informed her a local roofing company would pay adoption fees for dogs that had been at the shelter for a long time or had special needs. https://t.co/qTG13BOOqZ https://t.co/QQVSGLheoO

name: ABC
text:
Colorado Gov. Jared Polis says wearing masks is "not partisan," but "a ticket to more freedom."

“It makes it less likely that businesses will be shuttered. It makes it less likely that people will die. It makes it more likely school will return.” https://t.co/KPNJZ8JQNJ https://t.co/zJg6npgiPE

name: ABC
text: Multiple people were injured during a Bible study session on Saturday afternoon when an alleged member of the congregation stabbed the church's pastor before being stopped by the area’s police chief who happened to be in attendance. https://t.co/g6rtyoYiHs

name: ABC
text:
The United Arab Emirates has launched its first mission to Mars, kicking off the Arab world’s first interplanetary expedition.

The launch of the orbiter from Japan's Tanegashima Space Center marks the beginning of the 7-month journey to the Red Planet. https://t.co/ekeHYOMiEZ https://t.co/emSwZLpuRh

name: ABC
text: Joe Biden leads Pres. Trump on trust to handle the coronavirus pandemic by a 20-point margin, 54-34%, new @ABC News/WaPo poll finds. The two had been virtually tied on the issue in late March. https://t.co/GKNoSg6Aio

name: ABC
text: Three members of Thin Blue Line motorcycle club killed, four others hospitalized, in Texas crash caused by alleged drunk driver. https://t.co/yMGHbirDX1

name: ABC
text: MORE: Judge Esther Salas, the first Latina to serve on the federal bench in New Jersey, was not hurt. A suspect "remains at-large," a law enforcement official said. https://t.co/KnzERcajjw

name: ABC
text: Investigators have preliminary info that someone dressed as a FedEx driver arrived at the family home at about 5 p.m. Sunday. The judge’s son opened the door and was immediately shot, sources said. The judge’s husband was also shot multiple times. https://t.co/LgGvSJKDXc

name: ABC
text: The White House blocked Dr. Robert Redfield, director of the CDC, from testifying before Congress on how to reopen schools safely. https://t.co/hqTPi5VgPS

text: A now-viral Facebook post from a small town couple on race really just started as "a vent," Pamela Chandler, the author of the post, told @GMA. https://t.co/NOnj4et9ng

text: The suspect got away with an undisclosed amount of money, police said. https://t.co/ugWlUCPMhK

name: ABC
text: Pres. Trump’s approval rating drops to 39% in new @ABC News/Washington Post poll. It’s down nine points over the course of the pandemic, with his disapproval up 11 points. https://t.co/WZR5BXlZzF

name: ABC
text:
“We need to wear a mask, that example needs to be set by our national leadership,” Arkansas Gov. Asa Hutchinson says when pressed about Trump’s mixed messaging on masks.

“It shouldn’t be about politics,” he adds when asked about partisan divide on masks. https://t.co/Js5OA7CUX3 https://t.co/rM09KjWrfX

text: U.S. Marshals are offering $5,000 for tips on the two escaped convicts. https://t.co/PDr2XfnLY9

text: As many as two-thirds of pediatricians in the United States do not follow the newest guidelines about how to introduce peanuts to children for allergy prevention, according to a new report. https://t.co/OiVbEHOdq6

text: New Orleans Pelicans star Jrue Holiday said he'll donate the rest of his paychecks for the 2019-2020 season to help launch a social justice fund. https://t.co/CwHmFxyK2u

name: ABC
text: The Trump administration is seeking to phase out funding for coronavirus testing and contact tracing in a forthcoming GOP coronavirus relief package, according to two sources familiar with negotiations between the White House and Senate Republicans. https://t.co/iFKkizO0sn

text: Doctors are trying to learn how long people are protected from infection. https://t.co/BTIAoad5vI
